original_text: When Jesus saw her weeping, and the Jews who had come along with her also weeping, he was deeply moved in spirit and troubled.
korean_text: 예수께서 그가 우는 것과 또 함께 온 유대인들이 우는 것을 보시고 심령에 비통히 여기시고 불쌍히 여기사

sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 그녀가 우는 것을 보셨을 때

sentences.original_text: and Jews who had come along with her also weeping
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 함께 온 유대인들도 울고 있는 것을 보시고

sentences.original_text: he was deeply moved in spirit
